channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: THE KULTURE WAVE [R]
channel.desc: Riding on the Korean Wave! A culture news program that explores K-culture from all aspects with a variety of panelists and guests. Stay up to date on K-entertainment, K-trends, K-people, K-everything with \"the Kulture Wave\"!The Kulture Wave?Daily 14:00-14:30(KST). Kwon Soa.
